adrFormatAddress: 1271 6th Ave, New York, NY 10020, USA

originalText.text: Came here for a late lunch. The seafood is amazing. I particularly like the sea bass skewer, which was succulent, and the cerviche, which had the right balance of crunch from the vegetables and citrus. For dessert, the orange cake and the olive oil cake from the platter we shared were the standouts.

text.text: Came here for a late lunch. The seafood is amazing. I particularly like the sea bass skewer, which was succulent, and the cerviche, which had the right balance of crunch from the vegetables and citrus. For dessert, the orange cake and the olive oil cake from the platter we shared were the standouts.

originalText.text:
The Avra Rockefeller Center is an amazing and a top quality restaurant that provides guests with superb Greek style dishes and impeccable service.

In September of 2023, I brought and treated my wife and myself to dinner at Avra to celebrate her birthday!!! We very much enjoyed our dining experience.

Both my wife and I were quite impressed with the restaurant’s highly elegant and polished setting, its relaxed ambiance, and the welcoming treatment that we received from the staff.

Our server, Mauricio H. provided us with first class service. He was very courteous and polite, was quite adept on the menu options, promptly addressed all of our inquiries and did a great job on documenting our orders.

Both my and I absolutely enjoyed our meals!!! It was perfectly cooked, seasoned and unquestionably delicious!!! It was also quite satisfying!!!

For our entrees, my wife ordered and loved her lobster pasta meal, while I ordered and found my lamb chop entree to be amazing!!!

The other great attributes of Avra Rockefeller Center is that it is nestled in the heart of Midtown Manhattan, and is minutes away near numerous attractions ranging from the Rockefeller Center, Radio City Music Hall, St Patrick’s Cathedral and multiple Broadway Theaters!!!

My wife and I very much enjoyed celebrating her birthday at Avra Rockefeller and we highly recommend for everyone to visit and dine at this magnificent cuisine!!!

originalText.text: Beautiful place. And amazing food… really! So fresh. So tasty!!!! Especially the fish that I ordered! amazing location! Adding the menu so you can see the prices. I would say for the place and quilting not so expensive. Plus the portions was super nice. I couldn’t even finish. So they did take away for me. Lovely!

text.text: Beautiful place. And amazing food… really! So fresh. So tasty!!!! Especially the fish that I ordered! amazing location! Adding the menu so you can see the prices. I would say for the place and quilting not so expensive. Plus the portions was super nice. I couldn’t even finish. So they did take away for me. Lovely!

originalText.text: Enjoyed dinner one evening following the Rockettes in December. Few things to note....ask your server to suggest what's good. Sergio took excellent care of us and went the extra mile to make my birthday dinner extra special! What we thought we wanted and what we ordered were two different things and I don't regret it. I was able to select fresh prawns the size of my hand, perfectly cooked and served over a bed of linguine. In addition, do not miss out on their label of wine, had a delightfully crisp white. We were told all the food is flown in fresh every other day from Greece. I still cannot stop thinking of the Greek Salad - those tomatoes were to die for. The restaurant is beautiful, definitely not rushed. I'm looking forward to my next trip to NYC!

originalText.text: I was eager to try this place, attracted by the nice atmosphere. While the food was decent, my excitement turned to surprise when I ordered extra olives for my Greek Salad, only to receive two whole black olives on a small plate with a hefty $5 charge. Additionally, the potatoes tasted undercooked, leaving me quite disappointed with the overall experience.
